attributes.action: Stop peolpe with no clue having a say in what happens to our snakes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being a snake keeper all i hear about is petitions to stop people keeping snakes. The most recent is the burmese python who killed and ate a cat,recently a cat tried to kill my girlfriends rabbit,does this mean cats should be put on a dwa? If peolpe spent more money and time trying to get to know about snakes then they will quickly learn that they are not the slimey killers that people think.Millions of people across the world keep snakes and the only time you ever hear about them is when they are getting bad press from a badly written news paper article etc. Stop these people having a say in what happens to our snakes.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  You are welcome to resubmit your petition, but must include a more specific call for clear action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
